verses.text: \w I|strong="H1004"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* extol thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w for|strong="H1004"\w* thou hast raised \w me|strong="H1004"\w* up, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* hast \w not|strong="H1732"\w* \w made|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* foes \w to|strong="H1004"\w* rejoice \w over|strong="H1732"\w* \w me|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* cried \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* hast healed \w me|strong="H7311"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, thou hast \w brought|strong="H3068"\w* up \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul \w from|strong="H3068"\w* Sheol: thou hast kept me alive, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* not \w go|strong="H3068"\w* down \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* pit.

Sing praise \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* ye saints \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H2421"\w* thanks \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* holy name.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* anger \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w but|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* moment; \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* favour \w is|strong="H3068"\w* life: weeping \w may|strong="H3068"\w* tarry \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* night, \w but|strong="H3068"\w* joy \add cometh \add*\w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* morning.

\w As|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H3588"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* said \w in|strong="H3885"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* prosperity, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H2416"\w* never \w be|strong="H2416"\w* moved.
Thou, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w of|strong="H5769"\w* thy favour hadst made my mountain \w to|strong="H5769"\w* stand strong: thou didst hide thy face; \w I|strong="H7959"\w* was troubled.

\w I|strong="H6440"\w* cried \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w thee|strong="H6440"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H6440"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* supplication:

What profit \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* blood, \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3068"\w* \w down|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* pit? \w Shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* dust praise thee? \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* declare \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* truth?

\w Hear|strong="H5046"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* have mercy \w upon|strong="H3381"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w*: \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w be|strong="H1818"\w* \w thou|strong="H4100"\w* \w my|strong="H5046"\w* helper.

\w Thou|strong="H1961"\w* hast \w turned|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* mourning \w into|strong="H1961"\w* dancing; \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* hast loosed \w my|strong="H8085"\w* sackcloth, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* girded \w me|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* gladness:

\w To|strong="H2015"\w* \w the|strong="H6605"\w* end that \add my \add*glory may sing praise \w to|strong="H2015"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H8242"\w* \w not|strong="H6605"\w* be silent. \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H6605"\w* God, I will \w give|strong="H2015"\w* thanks \w unto|strong="H2015"\w* thee \w for|strong="H8057"\w* ever.
